Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc

Class JsonRpcErrorException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException
            • org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcErrorException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class JsonRpcErrorException
extends JsonRpcException

    Exception wrapper for JsonRpcError Useful in server implementations, throwing an error that will be transmitted to the client.

    See Also:
